name: muon-download
description: Download a Muon release from Brave/muon github repo.

scripts.release: lumo -c src build.cljs release && rm -rf out/
scripts.install: if [ -d 'vendor' ]; then rm -rf vendor/*; else mkdir vendor; fi && node main.js
scripts.clean: if [ -d 'vendor' ]; then rm -rf vendor/*; else mkdir vendor; fi

author: Metacritical <pankajdoharey@gmail.com>
Alex Johnson <github.com/notalex>
